tutorial.speak:
To set up attendance in Chums, start by clicking the Attendance icon.
Click the plus button in the Groups section.
You'll have three options: Add Campus, Add Service, or Add Service Time.
First, add a new campus by entering the campus name and clicking save.
Next, click Add Service to create a new service.
Select the campus location for this service.
Give your service a name.
Now add a service time for this service.
The service details including name, place, and time will appear in the group details.
Click add to include this service in the group details.
Finally, click save to complete the setup.
